meta.title: Privacy Policy - KeepsVault
meta.description: Learn how KeepsVault protects your privacy and handles your data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how we handle your personal information. We follow GDPR and global privacy standards to protect your data worldwide.

collect.title: What we collect
list: Your content (cards, files) that you choose to store.
Usage data to help run and improve the Service.

use.title: How we use it
list: To provide and secure the Service.
To support you and respond to requests.
To send important notices about the Service.

sharing.title: Sharing
list: We do not sell your data.
We may use trusted providers (e.g. hosting) under contract.
We may disclose if required by law.

storage.title: Storage and location
list: Data is stored securely in reputable cloud regions.
We apply encryption in transit and at rest.

rights.title: Your rights (GDPR)
list: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Erasure: Request deletion of your data
Portability: Export your data in a machine-readable format
Objection: Object to processing of your data
Withdrawal: Withdraw consent at any time

choices.title: Your choices
list: You can access, correct, or delete your data, subject to law and backups.
You can stop using the Service at any time.
